cards.title: Trouble
cards.text: Somebody important to this character faces trouble because of the element you own – severe illness, bankruptcy, doubt in their faith or similar.

cards.title: Rash Decision
cards.text: This character does something rash that causes them a lot of trouble with the element you own. An unwise sexual liaison; insulting an ally; destruction of property.

cards.title: Map Area Danger
cards.text: An area on the map is threatened. An attack by enemies, a natural disaster, a change from within or similar.

cards.title: Old Friend?
cards.text: Someone from this character’s past suddenly appears in an area on the map, with a request or demand..

cards.title: Interference
cards.text: The element you own is interfering with this character’s desires, wishes or needs.

cards.title: Theft
cards.text: Something important is stolen from this character by someone connected to the element you own.

cards.title: New Alignments
cards.text: The element you own changes allegiance, motivation or direction.

cards.title: Map Area Gift
cards.text: This character receives an unwanted and troublesome gift from an area on the map.

cards.title: Demand
cards.text: The element you own claims something from you that you might not be able to give.

cards.title: New Enemy
cards.text: This character makes an enemy in the element you own.

cards.title: Elemental Control
cards.text: This character must come to terms with the element you own, either mastering it, co-opting it, or accepting the element's control.

cards.title: Unexpected Help
cards.text: The element you own comes to this character's aid in some unexpected and surprising way. This is not without consequences.

cards.title: Yes, and
cards.text: ...you earn a friend, reward or good reputation in the process.

cards.title: Yes, and
cards.text: ...something completely unrelated is a smashing success.

cards.title: Yes, but…
cards.text: ...you earn a new enemy, debt or bad reputation in the process.

cards.title: Yes, but…
cards.text: ...something entirely unrelated goes badly wrong.

cards.title: Yes, but…
cards.text: ...your success will cause great personal harm.

cards.title: Yes, but…
cards.text: ...your success has dangerous and unintended consequences.

cards.title: Yes, but…
cards.text: ...your success will harm a friend, ally or loved one.

cards.title: Yes, but…
cards.text: ...in order to succeed you must sacrifice something dear to you.

cards.title: Perhaps…
cards.text: ...but this isn't something you can do alone. Help is needed.

cards.title: Perhaps…
cards.text: ...but if you want this done, someone more suited to the task must do it.

cards.title: No, but
cards.text: ...your failure helps another succeed.

cards.title: No, but
cards.text: ...you gain insight or knowledge that will be useful in the future.

cards.title: No, but
cards.text: ...you earn a friend, ally or goodwill in the process.

cards.title: No, but
cards.text: ...your failure has unexpected positive consequences.

cards.title: No, and…
cards.text: ...something entirely unrelated goes badly wrong.

cards.title: No, and…
cards.text: ...someone or something dear to you is harmed, lost or destroyed.
